title: Techguysally
author: Techguysally
content: My people I great una I trust we all doing great, i just wokeup this fine morning they go through news I came across of this news for Nairaland wei one woman finds drugs inside crayfish wei they ask her to deliver for abroad, according to her she dey carry load come Nigeria carry am go Italy so say person tell am he wan carry load go give him sister for Italy, she ask am wetin dey inside say na beans,garri, crayfish and some other food items,as she collect am reach house say make she check the am she notice say they put drugs inside the crayfish. Abeg my people Wetin una fit talk for this kind matter ? This our country where are we heading to? With this wahala everywhere everyday.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBUgP1Metbo

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Techguysally on April 22, 2023, 08:06:26 AM This our country where are we heading to? Do not make this kind of issues and situations peculiar to Nigeria alone. Bad people are everywhere who always want to take advantage of the good that other people are willing to for them. Quote from: Techguysally on April 22, 2023, 08:06:26 AMAbeg my people Wetin una fit talk for this kind matter ? Be careful of the kind of help you render so you don't get yourself into problems. Just as the story teaches that you should be careful with the people you help in delivering sealed packages, you should also be careful with people at ATM machines that give you their cards and ask that you help them withdraw money. Those cards may be stolen cards, and because ATM machines have cameras that take your pictures on every withdrawal, you may be the one to be arrested for the stolen card because on CCTV you are the one with the card making the withdrawal.
